text: Opglabbeek is a former municipality in the Belgian province of Limburg. On 1 January 2019, Meeuwen-Gruitrode and Opglabbeek were merged into the new municipality of Oudsbergen. In 2007, 9718 people lived there. It is at 51° 02 North, 05° 35 East. ==References== Category:Former municipalities of Limburg (Belgium)
title: Opglabbeek
